segments.text: Julia , look at me ! I'm gaining weight . How could I lose weight ? Do you have any good ideas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since summer is coming , I think swimming is a good way for you to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! Swimming can help you stay in shape by targeting all parts of your body .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Does swimming have other advantages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It could also help you increase vital capacity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That â€™ s great . Okay , from now on I would swim three times a week . I hope I can get rid of the weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will make it if you persist in it .
segments.speaker: S2
